titleStmt.title: A true discourse of the assault committed vpon the person of the most noble prince, William Prince of Orange, Countie of Nassau, Marquesse de la Vere &c. by Iohn Iauregui Spaniarde With the true copies of the writings, examinations, depositions, and letters of sundrie offenders in that vile and diuelish atempte. Faithfullye translated out of the Frenche copie printed at Antwerp by Christopher Plantin. Anno 1582.
titleStmt.author: Jáuregui y Aguilar, Juan de, 1583-1641.

titleStmt.title: A true discourse of the assault committed vpon the person of the most noble prince, William Prince of Orange, Countie of Nassau, Marquesse de la Vere &c. by Iohn Iauregui Spaniarde With the true copies of the writings, examinations, depositions, and letters of sundrie offenders in that vile and diuelish atempte. Faithfullye translated out of the Frenche copie printed at Antwerp by Christopher Plantin. Anno 1582.
titleStmt.author: Jáuregui y Aguilar, Juan de, 1583-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by H. Bynneman] for Thomas Charde and William Broome,

notesStmt.note: Iohn Iauregui Spaniarde = Juan de Jáuregui y Aguilar.
Printer's name from STC; publication date from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
